|flags=MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=1234 }} '''AC2200 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router''' :[http://www.zyxel.com/uk/en/products_services/nbg6815.shtml?t=p Product page (UK)] "EMGJ425-Q10A" and "REV:1.01A" appears to be silkscreened on the board. {{FCC ST|05/29/2016|indexme}} :See also [[ZyXEL NBG6716]] and [[ZyXEL NBG6816]].. ===Overview=== *Gigabit-class AC2200 wireless performance with MU-MIMO *6 internal antennas with outstanding performance *Usage Monitor monitors your broadband bandwidth *Bandwidth allocated to where needed with StreamBoost *ZyXEL ONE Connect discovers home connectivity and activities ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32989-zyxel-ac2200-mu-mimo-dual-band-wireless-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ZyXEL AC2200 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router Reviewed'']
on '''SmallNetBuilder''' ===See also=== *[[ZyXEL NBG6816]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG6816 I88NBG6816] (2015-06-26) :Dual-Band Wireless AC2350 Ultra HD Media Router :''ZyXEL ARMOR Z1'' - 12V/4A, 29W ([http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/armor_z1.shtml?t=p PPage]) *[[ZyXEL NBG6815]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG6815 I88NBG6815] (2015-11-30) :Dual-Band Wireless AC2200 Gigabit Ethernet Gateway *[[ZyXEL NBG6716]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG6716 I88NBG6716] (2013-08-09) :Dual-Band Wireless AC1750 HD Media Router *[[ZyXEL NBG6616]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG6616 I88NBG6616] (2014-09-17) :Dual-Band Wireless AC1200 HD Media Router ([http://www.zyxel.com/uk/en/products_services/nbg6616.shtml PPage]) *[[ZyXEL NBG6515]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG6515 I88NBG6515] (2015-07-28) :AC750 Dual band Wireless Gigabit Router ([http://www.zyxel.com/uk/en/products_services/nbg6515.shtml PPage]) :[[MediaTek]] MT7620A, MT7610EN, MT7530WU *[[ZyXEL NBG6503]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG6503 I88NBG6503] (2013-05-29) :Dual-Band Wireless AC750 Home Router *[[ZyXEL NBG5715]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG5715 I88NBG5715] (09/16/2011) :Dual-Band Wireless N Media Router *[[ZyXEL NBG5615]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG5615 I88NBG5615] (04/24/2013) :Dual-Band Wireless N750 Media Router *[[ZyXEL NBG4615]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88NBG4615 I88NBG4615] (01/19/2011) :Wireless N Gigabit NetUSB Router
